name: mistranslate
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
to translate words, documents, etc. (= change them into a different language) in a way that is not correct : On several occasions, officials mistranslated documents. The interpreter had mistranslated. The name of the dish was clearly mis-translated. Related word
mistranslation
More examplesFewer examplesThe letter had been mistranslated and was misleading.According to the report, the intercept had been mistranslated.The judge freed the men after learning the government had mistranslated the document that was used to suggest they were dangerous.
